DOC.detailed_description: In study , study team investigate validity role nasal dilator strip ( NDS ) , novel method determine site nasal valve compromise ( NVC ) , pre-operative evaluation . The method involve place strip sequentially upper low lateral cartilage record location optimal airway base patient 's subjective symptom . Investigators seek assess surgical outcome participant undergo rhinoplasty base pre-operative NDS classification . The Nasal Obstruction Septoplasty Effectiveness ( NOSE ) instrument use evaluate subjective symptom nasal obstruction , operation compare scores.The result help determine effectiveness predictive value NDS isolate site NVC . Additional study aim determine specificity predictive value nasal dilator strip determine location obstruction patient nasal valve compromise , assess role nasal dilator strip supplement replace current approach pre-operative evaluation nasal valve compromise . The target population study patient Emory Aesthetics Center undergo functional rhinoplasty nasal valve compromise obstruction .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergoing functional rhinoplasty nasal valve compromise obstruction Emory Aesthetics Center Inability speak English Any disability might prevent patient complete survey
